about.title: Who We Are
about.title2: Horeca Plus – Your Strategic Partner in Hospitality and Tourism.
about.title3: With over five decades of combined experience, we bring together expertise and deep industry knowledge to deliver meaningful solutions that truly support your business. This way, you have confidence in your decisions and grow your business with steady and measurable steps.
about.memberDescription: With over 20 years of experience in the hospitality and tourism sector, Stelios has held key roles such as Cost Controller Manager, Procurement Manager, Business Consultant, Production Manager, and Entrepreneur. He has managed large teams and complex projects, combining his deep knowledge of business planning with his ability to implement practical and efficient solutions. He specializes in cost management, process optimization, accounting support, and the development of customized software tools for businesses in the sector. His professionalism, technical expertise, and strategic thinking make a significant contribution to the growth and stability of any business aiming for progress.
about.memberDescription1: With more than 30 years of experience in the hospitality sector, Stratis possesses deep knowledge of the requirements and particularities of every stage of operating a food service establishment. He has the ability to identify and implement meaningful solutions to the challenges of a constantly evolving and demanding business environment. He specializes in procurement, with extensive experience in managing complex commercial agreements with food and beverage networks. His many years of expertise in the field of wine and spirits enable him to design efficient and profitable wine lists, tailored to the needs and character of each business. In addition, he has experience in staff training, with the goal of increasing sales and optimizing the customer experience.

services.heroSubtitle: We provide end-to-end services covering all critical stages of your operation: from financial analysis, costing and pricing strategy to equipment selection, supplier management, staff training and sales menu design.
services.introText: Our goal is to build viable, resilient and profitable businesses with practical tools, clear data and tailored guidance.
